body.p: In this chapter, you will learn how to use the basic Agavi facilities. By the end of this chapter, you will have a simple blog engine implementation. This is a great way to cover some of the architectural decisions that have guided Agavi's development. This chapter covers the topics of Model-View-Controller (MVC), Actions, Views, Models, database access and routing.
The resulting application is provided with this tutorial as the stage2 tarball. The archive also contains the mock database data for your importation pleasure.
